alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 24 at 3:26AM MST until December 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, Harding County, Union County and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects such as holiday decorations. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County
